text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5dc4e2f883896c99ebe83355822ac6067970b031|patch 8.2.2046: some test failures don't give a clear error>
patch 8.2.2046: some test failures don't give a clear error

Problem:    Some test failures don't give a clear error.
Solution:   Use assert_match() and assert_fails() instead of assert_true().
            (Ken Takata, closes #7368)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2046: some test failures don't give a clear error · vim/vim@5dc4e2f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2046: some test failures don't give a clear error · vim/vim@5dc4e2f
attachments.text: Problem: Some test failures don't give a clear error. Solution: Use assert_match() and assert_fails() instead of assert_true(). (Ken Takata, closes #7368)

patch 8.2.2045: highlighting a character too much with incsearch

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5ee0981fb5259f94900ab25207caddf1fa61010d|patch 8.2.2044: MS-Windows: swap file test sometimes fails>
patch 8.2.2044: MS-Windows: swap file test sometimes fails

Problem:    MS-Windows: swap file test sometimes fails.
Solution:   Use a more reliable way to change the process ID. When "timeout"
            fails use "ping" to wait up to ten minutes. (Ken Takata,
            closes #7365)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a09bee322e605c8a076fa23c3d3259495a1129d2|patch 8.2.2041: haskell filetype not optimally recognized>
patch 8.2.2041: haskell filetype not optimally recognized

Problem:    Haskell filetype not optimally recognized.
Solution:   Recognize all *.hsc files as Haskell. (Marcin Szamotulski,
            closes #7354)

attachments.text: Problem: Haskell filetype not optimally recognized. Solution: Recognize all *.hsc files as Haskell. (Marcin Szamotulski, closes #7354)

patch 8.2.2040: terminal buffer disappears even when 'bufhidden' is "hide"

Problem:    Terminal buffer disappears even when 'bufhidden' is "hide".
            (Sergey Vlasov)
Solution:   Check 'bufhiddden' when a terminal buffer becomes hidden.
            (closes #7358)
